00062 class PxParticleSystem : public PxParticleBase
00063 {
00064 public:
00065 
00066         virtual     const char*                 getConcreteTypeName() const                 {   return "PxParticleSystem"; }
00067 
00068 /************************************************************************************************/
00069 
00070 protected:
00071                                 PxParticleSystem(PxRefResolver& v) : PxParticleBase(v)      {}
00072     PX_INLINE                   PxParticleSystem() : PxParticleBase() {}
00073     virtual                     ~PxParticleSystem() {}
00074     virtual         bool        isKindOf(const char* name)  const       {   return !strcmp("PxParticleSystem", name) || PxParticleBase::isKindOf(name);  }
00075 
00076 };
00077 
00078 PX_INLINE PxParticleSystem*         PxActor::isParticleSystem()             { return is<PxParticleSystem>();    }
00079 PX_INLINE const PxParticleSystem*   PxActor::isParticleSystem()     const   { return is<PxParticleSystem>();    }
